Uses of Package
com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi

  • Packages that use com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi 
    Package Description
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot
    This package contains the classes that form the core of NCJBot.
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api
    This package contains the API for building applications on top of NCJBot.
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi
    This package contains the interfaces and classes required to build modules.
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modules
    This package contains several default modules.
  • Classes in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi used by com.github.uberroot.ncjbot 
    Class and Description
    AbstractModule
    The abstract class that all NCJBot modules must inherit from.
    ConnectionFactory
    This interface defines the API for establishing and utilizing connections with other nodes, abstracting the underlying socket usage.
    OverlayManager
    An interface for modules that manage the overlay network.
    Server
    This interface defines the behavior required to implement a server for handling and dispatching network connection requests.
    Watchdog
    This interface defines the functionality required to actively detect node failures.
  • Classes in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi used by com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api 
    Class and Description
    OverlayManager
    An interface for modules that manage the overlay network.
    Watchdog
    This interface defines the functionality required to actively detect node failures.
  • Classes in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi used by com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi 
    Class and Description
    AbstractModule
    The abstract class that all NCJBot modules must inherit from.
    ConnectionFactory.Connection
    This interface defines the functionality for utilizing a connection with a RemoteNode.
    ConnectionFactory.Connection.EventListener
    A listener for events that may occur with the connection.
    Exclusive
    A tagging interface to identify interfaces that must be loaded once and only once into NCJBot.
    Runner
    This interface defines the behavior for objects that run tasks.
    Runner.RunnerState
    Defines the possible states for a Runner.
  • Classes in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi used by com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modules 
    Class and Description
    AbstractModule
    The abstract class that all NCJBot modules must inherit from.
    ConnectionFactory
    This interface defines the API for establishing and utilizing connections with other nodes, abstracting the underlying socket usage.
    ConnectionFactory.Connection
    This interface defines the functionality for utilizing a connection with a RemoteNode.
    ConnectionFactory.Connection.EventListener
    A listener for events that may occur with the connection.
    Exclusive
    A tagging interface to identify interfaces that must be loaded once and only once into NCJBot.
    OverlayManager
    An interface for modules that manage the overlay network.
    Runner
    This interface defines the behavior for objects that run tasks.
    RunningModule
    An AbstractClass for modules that actively perform tasks and require their own threadpools.
    Server
    This interface defines the behavior required to implement a server for handling and dispatching network connection requests.
    Watchdog
    This interface defines the functionality required to actively detect node failures.
